body_html:
Had a related (I presume) issue with current d42facc and bazel@c728a631, just adding this here for reference:

~/tensorflow$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
Sat Jun 4 07:22:15 UTC 2016 : === Using tmpdir: /tmp/tmp.wBMcP4UriY
rsync: change_dir "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow//bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/org_tensorflow/external" failed: No such file or directory (2)
rsync error: some files/attrs were not transferred (see previous errors) (code 23) at main.c(1183) [sender=3.1.1]

Fixed by symlinking the path referenced in the error to ~/tensorflow/bazel-bin/external.

body:
Had a related (I presume) issue with current tensorflow@d42facc3 and bazel@c728a631, just adding this here for reference:

```
~/tensorflow$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
Sat Jun 4 07:22:15 UTC 2016 : === Using tmpdir: /tmp/tmp.wBMcP4UriY
rsync: change_dir "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow//bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/org_tensorflow/external" failed: No such file or directory (2)
rsync error: some files/attrs were not transferred (see previous errors) (code 23) at main.c(1183) [sender=3.1.1]
```

Fixed by symlinking the path referenced in the error to `~/tensorflow/bazel-bin/external`.
